Plot: Meet Seymour Bernstein: a beloved pianist, teacher and true inspiration who shares eye-opening insights from an amazing life. Ethan Hawke helms this poignant guide to life.
Title: Seymour: An Introduction
Actors: Seymour Bernstein, Jiyang Chen, Ethan Hawke, Junko Ichikawa
tomatoConsensus: Seymour Bernstein's genuineness shines so brightly in Seymour: An Introduction that viewers will forgive debuting director Ethan Hawke's reverent treatment.
